summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) waiver form for a voluntary employee interview. The form provides warnings and assurances to an employee being asked to provide information as part of an OIG investigation pertaining to 'Job performance failure and security failure.' It includes signature blocks for the employee, an OIG Special Agent, and a witness.

persons.name: Stepho Nt
persons.context: Listed as the 'Name of Witness' on the OIG voluntary interview waiver form.

keyFacts: The document is an OIG Form III-226/2 (dated 05/03/21) used for non-custodial employee interviews.
The investigation being conducted pertains to 'Job performance failure and security failure.'
The form emphasizes the interview is voluntary and that no disciplinary action will be taken if the employee chooses not to answer questions.
Any statement provided may be used as evidence in future criminal or agency disciplinary proceedings.
The form includes signature blocks for the employee, an OIG Special Agent, and a witness named 'Stepho Nt'.
